articles.title: Delroy Lindo scores first Oscar nomination at 73 after past snubs - Entertainment Weekly
articles.description: Beloved vet Delroy Lindo, who just earned his first-ever Oscar nomination for 'Sinners,' opened up to EW about having been long ignored by the Academy. 'One must keep working.'

articles.title: Nicki Minaj faces possible sale of $20m mansion after failing to pay $503k court judgment - International Business Times UK
articles.description: Nicki Minaj could lose her $20 million California mansion after failing to comply with a court order to pay $503,000 to a former employee, with a judge set to issue a final ruling this week.
